banner.title: 3D-Block
banner.info: 3D-Block是丰富的模型库、人仔功能、3d说明书、导入图片参考、傻瓜式易上手的平台

interaction.info: Sean Kenney uses LEGO toys to create award-winning exhibits, portraiture, children's books, and commissioned artwork.

modelbase.title: On exhibition
modelbase.content: Comprised of hundreds of beautiful, thought-provoking sculptures built with millions of LEGO bricks, Sean's exhibits — produced by Imagine Exhibitions — are touring botanical gardens, zoos, arboretums, science centers, and non-traditional venues around the world.

robot.title: On exhibition
robot.content: Comprised of hundreds of beautiful, thought-provoking sculptures built with millions of LEGO bricks, Sean's exhibits — produced by Imagine Exhibitions — are touring botanical gardens, zoos, arboretums, science centers, and non-traditional venues around the world.

manual.title: On exhibition
manual.content: Comprised of hundreds of beautiful, thought-provoking sculptures built with millions of LEGO bricks, Sean's exhibits — produced by Imagine Exhibitions — are touring botanical gardens, zoos, arboretums, science centers, and non-traditional venues around the world.

design.title: 产品设计开发
design.info: Sean Kenney's award-winning exhibitions have been touring the world for over a decade and feature hundreds of beautiful, thought-provoking sculptures created with over 3 million LEGO pieces.
